ruleBP_R0002.name: Invalid XML against schema
ruleBP_R0002.message: XML document is invalid against the schema.

ruleBP_R0004.name: Duplicated project title and description
ruleBP_R0004.message: Both project title and description are duplicated with the submitted projects. Duplicated project should not be submitted.

ruleBP_R0005.name: Identical project title and description
ruleBP_R0005.message: Project title and description are identical. Please provide more detailed description.

ruleBP_R0014.name: Invalid publication identifier
ruleBP_R0014.message: Invalid publication identifier, enter valid pubmed id, pmc id or DOI.

ruleBP_R0016.name: Invalid umbrella project
ruleBP_R0016.message: Invalid project is selected as an umbrella project. Please select a valid umbrella project.

ruleBP_R0018.name: Taxonomy at species or infraspecific rank
ruleBP_R0018.message: Taxonomy should be species or infraspecific level.

ruleBP_R0020.name: Metagenome or environmental
ruleBP_R0020.message: When sample_scope is "Environment", taxonomy must be a metagenome where lineage starts with unclassified sequences and scientific name ends with 'metagenome'.

ruleBP_R0038.name: Taxonomy name and id not match
ruleBP_R0038.message: Organism and taxonomy id do not match.

ruleBP_R0039.name: Taxonomy error warning
ruleBP_R0039.message: Submission processing may be delayed due to necessary curator review. Please check spelling of organism, current information generated the following error message and will require a taxonomy consult.

ruleBP_R0045.name: Invalid value for controlled terms
ruleBP_R0045.message: Provided value is not in controlled terms.

ruleBP_R0046.name: Invalid value for controlled terms
ruleBP_R0046.message: Provided value is not in controlled terms.

ruleBP_R0047.name: Multiple values
ruleBP_R0047.message: Only single value is allowed but multiple values are provided. First value was used for validation.

ruleBP_R0049.name: Invalid value format
ruleBP_R0049.message: Value must be in defined format.

ruleBP_R0050.name: Invalid value format
ruleBP_R0050.message: Value must be in defined format.

ruleBP_R0051.name: Missing at least one required fields in a group
ruleBP_R0051.message: Missing field(s) in at least one required field group.

ruleBP_R0052.name: Missing at least one required fields in a group
ruleBP_R0052.message: Missing field(s) in at least one required field group.

ruleBP_R0053.name: Missing required fields in a group
ruleBP_R0053.message: Missing field(s) in at least one required field group.

ruleBP_R0054.name: Missing required fields in a group
ruleBP_R0054.message: Missing field(s) in at least one required field group.

ruleBP_R0055.name: Null value is not allowed
ruleBP_R0055.message: Null value ('not collected', 'not applicable' or 'missing') is not allowed.

ruleBP_R0056.name: Null value is not allowed
ruleBP_R0056.message: Null value ('not collected', 'not applicable' or 'missing') is not allowed.

ruleBP_R0057.name: Missing conditionally required field
ruleBP_R0057.message: Missing field(s) in conditionally required field.

ruleBP_R0058.name: Missing conditionally required field
ruleBP_R0058.message: Missing field(s) in conditionally required field.

ruleBP_R0060.name: Non-ASCII characters
ruleBP_R0060.message: Non-ASCII format characters detected. Please check for non-standard characters in your field values around [### Non-ASCII character ###] and reformat as ASCII-only so that data can be properly consumed by dependent databases.

ruleBP_R0061.name: Invalid value for null
ruleBP_R0061.message: Invalid 'null' value, please provide value as either 'not collected', 'not applicable' or 'missing' for mandatory field.

ruleBP_R0063.name: Null value in optional field
ruleBP_R0063.message: Null values are not neccesary in optional fields. Leave values empty when there is no information.

ruleBP_R0064.name: Not predefined field name
ruleBP_R0064.message: Not predefined field name is used.

ruleBP_R0065.name: Duplicated field name
ruleBP_R0065.message: Fileld names are duplicated. Only First one was used for validation.

ruleBP_R0066.name: Value in comment line
ruleBP_R0066.message: Value in comment line is ignored.

ruleBP_R0067.name: Invalid JSON structure
ruleBP_R0067.message: JSON structure is invalid against schema.

ruleBP_R0068.name: Invalid file format
ruleBP_R0068.message: Only JSON and TSV formats are supported.

ruleBP_R0069.name: Missing mandatory field names
ruleBP_R0069.message: Mandatory field name is missing. Even if there is no value to be described, the field name must be described.
